pkgmetadata.longdescription: Blyth-Still-Casella Confidence Interval // Provides a fast calculation of the Blyth-Still-Casella confidence interval. The implementation follows the 'StatXact' 9 manual (Cytel 2010) and "Refining Binomial Confidence Intervals" by George Casella (1986) doi:10.2307/3314658.
